reviewText: I'm so glad I found this!! We had this VHS in our home collection when I was a kid and it later got misplaced. I was heartbroken because it was one of my favorites. I'd watch it over and over and over. Then I found it here and at such affordable price there was no way I wasn't getting it! Well, as fate would have it, it arrived on my birthday!! I watched it for the first time in 18 years and couldn't stop smiling the entire time. Thank you for allowing me to revisit a very dear part of my childhood!
This VHS played a huge role in my upbringing.  I learned my shapes and colors with Simon and Chloe in the big city.  I look forward to sharing it with my children.
